data.description: Index and callback on all pods
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Need a way to apply a callback mechanism on all pods. will support
    a saved index of pods, and different functionality for new, changed,
    missing and old pods

    Intend to use it to build indexes similar to perlindex's, and a
    table of contents I have designed for podindex
